profile.name: Navdeep Gill
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Expert in Python, Go, and Java with a passion for Database Sharding
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with 3+ years of experience in developing scalable applications using various programming languages. Proven track record of delivering high-quality projects on time.
profile.company:
Based on the provided information, I would recommend the following companies:

1. Salesforce
2. Digital

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at Digital
description: Designed and developed multiple Python-based projects, including data-quality-checker and agentspring.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement proxy-servers and samplemod.
Utilized Go for wasm-cat project development.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple Java-based projects, including setup.py.
Contributed to open-source projects using Jupyter Notebook.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated multiple open-source repositories.
Collaborated with other developers to resolve issues and improve code quality.
